1.content: Are you a boy or a girl?
1.title: Choose your gender.

111.content:
Your name is Brad and you are 15 years old. You are about 6 feet tall with a slim build and have blond hair. You hear your alarm ring and put your pillow over your ears, so you can go back to sleep. Unfortunately, it doesn't work and you get up anyway. You are really excited today. The reason is because you are going to start doing labs in Chem 20, starting today. You get dressed, go downstairs, grab a piece of toast that was made for you and eat it. Then, you go back upstairs to brush your teeth, and grab your schoolbag and books. You go downstairs, put on your shoes and go out the door.
"Love you!" you say heading out the door. "See ya later!"

After you get to school you......
111.title: The Beginning.

1111.content:
Chemistry was soooo boring today. You thought it would be exciting, but it wasn't. You thought you'd be funny and mix some chemicals together. It starts to bubble, smoke, then it explodes all over you, and a couple of your friends, standing beside you. Then, the bell rang and you almost left the classroom, but your teacher made you stay and clean it up.
You finally got it cleaned, and went to your next class, which was....
1111.title: Chemistry

11111.content: After cleaning up your mess after Chemistry class, you had to rush to make it Phys. Ed class. Luckily you weren't late by much so the teacher left you off the hook. During class...
11111.title: Off to Phys.Ed.

111111.content: Half way through Phys. Ed, you began to feel weird. It seems during Chemistry class when that goop hit you, it affected your age and it couldn't come at worse time. So during Phys. Ed, you became..
111111.title: The Changes Begin

1111112.content: You feel yourself getting younger, as your clothes become bulky, you get shorter and... yep, your "private area" is losing it's original size. Quickly, you ask the teacher to use the bathroom. Slipping inside, you hide in one of the stalls. The process continues until you're...
1111112.title: Younger

11111121.content: 10 years old! At this age, you should be in 5th grade. First things first, you've got to get out of here! The way you see it, you have a few options: get help, of course (option 1), get home (option 2) or try to reverse the process (option 3). After a bit of thought, you take...
11111121.title: 10 Years Old.

choices: Mabye I should think this through.
111111211.content: You sure you want to do that? Might not be such a good idea; people who hear that you somehow regressed into a 10 year old may think you're nuts.
111111211.title: Option 1.

1111112111.content:
Luckily you hear the bell ring and walk outside into the hallways. You carefully slip outside and catch your bus home. Nobody notices you as you ride your normal bus route home.

As you run up to your house you open the door and slam it shut behind you. You let out a deep breath as you hear a voice from the hallway.
1111112111.title: I'll Take That Risk!

11111121111.content: You turn to look and see your mother looking at you strange, "Hmmm...." she says examining you. You feel strange looking up at your mom again being only 10 years old. You don't know what to say to her as she looks at you strangely.
11111121111.title: It's Your Mother

111111211111.content:
You mother laughs, "Is that you Brad?"

You nod your head, "What the hell happened to me? I'm like 10 years old now!"

Your mom explains, "I always wondered if you would inherit the power...I guess you did!"

"What power?"

"It skips many generations, but always appears again. Our family has a magical power!"

"How did I change into a kid?"

Mom sits down, "You did it to yourself...you must have subconsciously been thinking about something, or saw something...."

"I remember seeing a 5th grader walk out of the bathroom before me and I wished I had that easy homework again!"

Mom points her finger, "That's it! It must have sparked the magic!"

"So it wasn't the goop from Chem class..." You mumble to yourself.
111111211111.title: She Laughs

1111112111111.content:
Mom explains, "You have to learn how to control the changes before you can make them with any consistincey!"

"How do I do that?"

Mom said, "Just think hard and imagine yourself as somebody else either older or younger. You also need something to trigger the change like the 5th grader you saw walking out of the bathroom. The trigger doesn't need to be a person though, it could really be anything! It's different for everybody!"

You think hard and imagine yourself as a teenager again and....
1111112111111.title: How Do I Change Back?

11111121111111.content:
"What gives? Nothing happened?"

You mom agrees, "You may need to relax for a bit and try later!"

She walks into the kitchen and starts making dinner. You follow her, "I can't just walk around the house as a 10 year old!" You complain.

Mom giggles, "There's really nothing we can do honey...until you learn how to change back.!"

You groan as your mom makes dinner and you decide to watch TV. You sit with your legs dangling off the couch shaking your head. You need to find a way to use your magical power to get out of this body!
11111121111111.title: Nothing Happens

111111211111111.content:
You decided to get up and go downstairs. As you ran, you noticed how big the stairs looked now. You finally ran into the basement washroom and saw a bunch of ancient artifacts. Each looked different.

There was a mystical baby doll, labeled Youth.
There was a mystical rocking chair, labeled Age.
There was a bottle of acne cream, labeled Teen.
There was a lipstick tube, labeled Gender Change.

You decided to pick the . . .
111111211111111.title: You Go Into the Basement

1111112111111111.content:
You pick up the baby doll, and shook it, saying, "I want to go back to my original age of fifteen." Suddenly, there was a flash of light, and you felt yourself shrinking.

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO ... !" you scream.

As you grew younger it slowly became the cry of a...
1111112111111111.title: The Magical Doll

choices: Told Your Younger Sister to Watch You.
You Wake Up the Next Morning.
11111121111111111.content:
You crawled your way out of your clothes, which suddenly transformed into a baby blanket! You realized you were now in a baby diaper and baby footsie pajamas! You began to crawl upstairs to get some help. It took a while, but you finally got upstairs, and you saw a baby gate!

You began to cry. Finally, someone came. It was your mother, when she was younger.

"Oh, Brad," she cooed. "How did you get over there?"

She picked you up, apparently believing you really were a baby, as she carried you in the kitchen, you noticed a high chair at the table, with a jar of baby food. She sat you into the high chair, as you babbled like an infant. She scooped up some squashed peas. You may have made a mess, but she cleaned it up.

Then you felt yourself poop into your diaper. You began to cry.

"Ah," She cooed. "Does somebody need a diaper change?"

She sat you on a changing table, and removed your diaper, put your chubby legs in the air, and changed your diaper. Once she got your new diaper on, she carried you into your room, which had become a baby boy's nursery, with a diaper bag, and a crib. She laid you in the crib for a nap, and . . .
11111121111111111.title: You Become an Infant

111111211111111112.content:
You wake up and realize it was all one big dream! You're back to your real life as a seven year old girl from Georgia, who still wears diapers and is in kindergarten...

THE END
111111211111111112.title: You Wake Up the Next Morning.

1111112111111111121.content: Is it the end or just the beginning?
1111112111111111121.title: Or is it?

11111121111111111211.content:
What is the wpilogue about:
1 - Your 7th birthday
2 - You going back to your original age and gender
3 - You growing older
4 - Nothing; the story's over
11111121111111111211.title: Epilogue

choices: Your going back to your original age and gender
111111211111111112111.content: So which one is it?
111111211111111112111.title: 1 or 2

111111211111111112112.content: Which one is it, you growing older or the end?
111111211111111112112.title: 3 or 4

111111211111111222.content: Then you want the lipstick?
111111211111111222.title: No

choices: You Change Genders but Not Age
1111112111111112221.content: You slowly pick up the lipstick tube and open it. You slowly and a little sloppily you run the red lipstick across your lips. Then you start to feel your body changing.
1111112111111112221.title: Yes

11111121111112.content: Suddenly, in a flash of light, you began to change until you were about...
11111121111112.title: Something Starts to Change

111111211111121.content:
You looked down to find yourself in nothing, but a shirt and a wet diaper. You were a chubby three year old child!
"Oh, darn," said your Mom. "It didn't go as planned. I'll get your diaper changed, and then we'll go from there, ok?"
Unfortunately, after she changed you, she layed you down in a nursery and the fifteen year old you was never seen for twelve more years.
111111211111121.title: Toddler Days

choices: She Thinks You Are Her Twin.
11111121112.content: Your ten year old sister walked in, and noticed you. Does she recognize you as her elder brother, or does she think you're her twin brother?
11111121112.title: It's Your Sister

111111211121.content:
"Who are you?", Brad heard his sister, Jessica ask. When he turned around she was right in front of him, they we're both the same age now, but she was now a couple of inches taller than him. I guess girls really do mature faster than boys.

"J..Jessica?!?", Bad said shocked.

"What are you doing in my house, and how do you know my name?", Jessica asked, then looked closer. "You look familiar....Wait, Brad!", she exclaimed.

"Be quiet.", Brad said, not wanting anyone to see him like this.

"What happened to you? How come your a kid?", Jessica asked.

"I don't know. Now please shut up.", Brad demanded.

"But..", Brad covered her mouth, before she could say anything else.

Just then
111111211121.title: She Thinks You Are Older.

111111212.content: Okay, option 1 is out of the question! Now you have a choice, will you go home or try to reverse the process? Don't worry, there are no wrong answers.
111111212.title: Option 2 or 3.

1111112121.content:
You ran home, trying to keep your clothes on, and entered your house. Once inside, you closed the door and your mother walked in.

"Oh, honey," she said, "How was school today?"

"Didn't she notice how young I am?" you thought angrily, but said in your new childish voice, "Hell."

"Well, don't worry baby, you're almost out of grade school."

"No!" you screamed.
1111112121.title: Get Home.

11111121211.content:
That night, you went to bed at the 8:00 bedtime you had, when you were ten years old. As you laid down, you thought I don't wanna be ten anymore! over and over again.

When you woke up you realized you weren't ten, but you still weren't fifteen.

How old were you?
11111121211.title: Doesn't Go as Planned

111111212111.content:
You were no older than a kindergartener! You jumped out of bed, just as your mom came in.

"Oh, good, you're up," she said. "Come on, let's getcha ready for your first day of school."

After that, she bathed you, dressed you, got you breakfast, put you in your car seat, and took you into the kindergarten classroom of the elementary school.
Once you got in, your mind adjusted the mentality and intelligence of a child who had not yet been through kindergarten, and began to act just like a five year old.
111111212111.title: First Day of Kindergarten

11111121212.content: Unfortunately, from that point on, you became an immortal ten-year-old. On the positive side, you did manage to live an adult life, so you got mankind's #1 desire - eternal youth!
11111121212.title: Forever Ten Years Old

11111122.content:
You're still getting younger but your mind is staying the same. Your best friend Chris comes into the bathroom and sees you shrinking and becoming younger! He is shocked and notices you are still shrinking! You're now 5 years old and you should be in kindergarten at this age! Then your baggy clothes start shrinking to fit you. Your shorts become smaller right in front of Chris! Then your top changes into a bright blue top with a dog on it. Your boxer shorts turn into superhero briefs

"Wow, what a way to keep your youth!" Chris says.

Chris then offers his help.
11111122.title: 5 Years Old.

choices: Chris Says Yes Because He Wants to Play a Joke on You
Chris Says No and Drives You to His Mom's House
111111221.content:
"Yes, help me out here!" You say.

Chris tells you to follow him. He leads you to the back door of the bathroom that leads into an outside hallway. As you and Chris turn into thehallway you run into the girl you like ;Sarah.

Sarah looks at you.
"Aw, what a cutie!" She bends down and picks you up. She holds you with both hands under your arms and you feel weird. You just look at her with a cute child like face so she doesn't suspect anything.

"Aw!" She coos at you. "Hey Chris who's this wittle guy?" She coos more.

"Um, he's my little cousin. I guess he must have hid in the back of my car" He says.

"He's soooo cute!" Sarah cooed once again. "Can I take him to my Child Care class? They said we could bring our little siblings or cousins. Besides looks like he needs a change," You look down and notice your shorts have changed into pullups! And she was right you did need a change. "We have diapers and stuff. It'll only be for an hour."
111111221.title: Say Yes

1111112211.content:
"Sure," he said.
"No," you whine.
"Oh, don't worry, little guy," she said. "I'm not gonna hurt ya."
She took you away and changed your diaper.
1111112211.title: Chris' Joke

choices: I don't remember you being this young before...
11111122112.content: As Sara leads you into the child care classroom, you start getting younger. Right before you get to the door you get to young to walk and fall. Sara picks you up and says...
11111122112.title: Child Care Classroom

111111221122.content:
"Well I don't recall being this young before," she says, as you crawl around on the floor, barely 2 years old.

"Oooh or me?" you ask, you speech becoming more like that of the average toddler.

"Well, you are pretty young, but I feel a little strange myself," she tells you, as you notice she has also slipped a few years back in time.

"Oh no, it hapnin a you too?"

Indeed, she did appear to have gotten younger, just as the tingling sensation had dissipated from you. It seemed to have transferred to her.

"What the heck," she commented as her clothing changed," I haven't worn this outfit since..."
111111221122.title: I don't remember being this young before...

choices: You Proceed to Rapidly Get Older
1111112211222.content:
"The last time I wore this was at 9 years old," she mentions to you, and then notices her voice.

"Hey, my voice sounds like what it did when I was 9---no 8 years old," she said, feeling confused.

"Oohs gettin' youngah'," you tell her, as she continues to regress. She soon finds she is 6 years old, and her body continues to shrink. Baby fat returns more and more, and she is now wearing an Elmo t-shirt and a short skirt.

"Wow, I be gettin' real young huh," she replied as she passed 5, then 4 and then to 3 years old.

"Me big girwul, wear twainin' pants," she told you--"wait, how I get a be so wittle, huh?"

"Chwis, whas goin' on herewa," you holler, and then Sara grabs hold of you and...
1111112211222.title: I was 9 Years Old

choices: He Becomes a Woman and Your New Mom
11111122112222.content:
As you touch each others hands, you hear Chris gasp off to one side.

"Oh crap, what is happening to me?"

"Ooo you're changing too," Sara tells him.

"How?"

That is when you notice...
11111122112222.title: Something Happens to Chris Too

1111112212.content:
"Sorry, but no, I gotta take this little guy back to his mom's house" Chris said making Sarah pout and say, "Awww, but hopefully you'll bring him around again"

Chris soon took you over to his car and after buckling you in the back seat soon drove you back to your house and rang the doorbell.

Soon enough your mother was at the door and what was her reaction?
1111112212.title: Chris Says No

11111122122.content:
Much to your surprise, your mother seemed rather delighted by the news instead of horrified. "Why aren't you such a little cutie now, honey" she said as she took you from Chris's arms. "Thank you for bringing him right back here, Chris. Go ahead and get back to class, I'll take care of this". As Chris left, your mother took you back inside the house.

"I'm confused.... why aren't you like... shocked or anything?" You ask, getting suspicious of how little your mother seemed concerned about your predicament.

Your mother smiled at you, "Well I will say I wasn't expecting this, but I'm a lot more happy that I have my little baby boy back". She was almost squealing as she said this.

You did not share your mother's enthusiasm one bit, "but how are we going to change me back?".

"I dunno honestly" your mother admitted

You whined, "But you said you would take care of this!!!"

Your mother responded in a stern voice, "One, there will be no whining or any tantrums in this house young man. Two, I didn't necessarily mean that I'd solve your problems for you..." She shifted her voice to a sweeter tone, "Three, Mommy wasn't quite ready for her little baby to grow up anyway", kissing you on the forehead.

"well this is just great" you thought to yourself. Not only were you stuck as a 5 year old for now, your over-protective mother was not all that concerned about reversing this change.

"No pouting either, young man". In fact she seemed to be taking advantage of your little predictament. "Oh I bet Emily will be very delighted to have a new baby brother!"

Emily was your spoiled 12 year old little siste, though she would always act as if she was the 'older' sibling looking after you - but now that was a reality. Now that was a scary thought.

Though not as scary as what happened next.
11111122122.title: Reacts In Delight

choices: A baby! (Less than a year old)
111111221222.content:
As you realize that your spoiled sister really was older than you now, and would probably take full advantage of that fact, you shudder in fear. And then keep shuddering as a familiar feeling passes through you.

No, no, no no, nooooo! You cry tears welling up in your eyes as you start getting younger again. "I don't wana be ba-be!" You cry a lisp forming as you get younger dropping to three years old. Like before you can feel your trainers morph and change swelling to become a disposable diaper. A diaper that soon grows warm as you wet yourself again.

You feel yourself be picked up as your mother gently cradles you to her chest, patting your back and making soothing noises as your baggy clothes start to change to something ore age appropriate.

"Shhh. It's ok baby. Mommies here. No need to cry sweetie."

You keep crying though realizing you really were becoming the baby of the family. The only question was how young you would get.
111111221222.title: You start getting even younger

choices: Emily, your 12 yr old spoiled sister
1111112212221.content:
Not even a toddler, you couldn't be any older than 3 now.

That's what you realized when your mother brought you up to a mirror, still holding you in her arms. You were now wearing what looked like a spongebob t-shrit and suspender shorts, and you could tell from feeling it that you were wearing training-paints underneath. Your hair was a lot shorter and thinner, while your cheeks, along with the rest of your body, looked kind of chubby.

"Oh doesn't Mommies little baby looks so handsome!" your mother squealed. Clearly she was not at all concerned with returning you to your proper age.

Just then you heard what was probably the front door open. All of a sudden your mother seemed even more ecstatic.

"Oh guess who just came home" your mother said in a cutesy patronizing voice before rushing to the front door.

Before you could say anything to your mother, you saw just who had entered the house. With a look of horror on your face, you saw in front of you ....
1111112212221.title: A toddler (2-3 years old)

choices: Emily forces you to do her bidding
Emily forces you to play a game with her
11111122122211.content:
"Whose the little brat, Joana?" your 12 yr old sister bluntly remarked, referring to mother by her first name instead of "Mom" as usual. "Babysitting one of the neighbor's little brats?"

"Well actually dear..." your mother responded with a grin on her face.

You did not like where this was going...

"This handsome little boy is your brother Brad"

Your sister stopped what she was doing instantly, standing silent, looking at you.

"It's a long story, but basically your brother has regressed back into a little boy". Your mother started pinching your chubby cheeks. "And now Mommy can have some more time with her little baby".

With that your sister came up to you, starring at your new form. Whatever she was doing you knew to be very afraid once she started grinning.

"Not so big now, uh 'Braddy boy'". You hated whenever she called you that. And it usually meant that she was up to no go-

Before you could say anything, Emily snatched you out of your mother's arms. You started screaming as she rushed towards the stairs.

"You don't mind if I play with my baby brother a bit, do you 'Mom'"? Emily said from the stairs, making sure to put on an deceivingly innocent looking face and cutesy eyes. She only ever acted so innocent, let alone refer to mother as 'Mom', whenever she was wanting something.

"Sure Emily," your mother said, "I'm sure Brad would be delighted to play with his big sister". Actually you were quite the opposite of delighted.

"Thanks Mommy" Emily said in an overly girly voice, again she only referred to mother by 'Mom' whenever she wanted something. With that your sister rushed up the rest of the stairs, holding you way too tightly; you almost had trouble breathing. Before long, you were in your sister's room, as she looked down at you with devilous eyes.

"Alright, short stuff," she said, "we are going to play a little game"

You stayed completely still in your sister's arms, horrified as to what your sister was planning to do with you -
11111122122211.title: Emily, your 12 yr old spoiled sister

choices: Emily wnats a selfie with you
111111221222112.content: "Oh I know!" exclaims Emily. She shifts you in her arms before continuing "why don't we play..."
111111221222112.title: Emily forces you to play a game with her

111112.content: You feel strange but nothing happens to you yet next you head to history.
111112.title: Nothing Happens Yet

111112122.content: Are you five months old or five years?
111112122.title: Kindergartener or Baby?

11112.content: You sit down in your seat and suddenly, as the teacher was explaining things, you began to feel your clothes getting bigger! You realized you were growing younger! You grew smaller and smaller, until you were...
11112.title: You Begin to Grow Younger

111121.content:
You looked down and realized that your underwear had become a diaper and your shirt and pants had become a pair of red footsie pajamas. Your feet didn't even come off the ground. You were babbling quietly like a two year old, which you realized was your current age. Suddenly, the teacher came over and picked you up.

"Ah, how did you get in here, little guy?" she cooed. She carried you out of the classroom, and took you to the clinic.

"Who's this?" asked the nurse.

"I don't know," the teacher said. "But perhaps we should - "

But she was interrupted by a frantic voice. Who was it?
111121.title: Diapers

choices: Layed You Down for a Nap.
1111211.content:
It was your Mother!

She came in and said, "Oh, thank God! there you are, baby!"
She picked you up and took you home. Once there, she...
1111211.title: Your Mother.

11112111.content:
Your mom laid you on the changing table, and lifted your little legs in the air.

She removed your diaper, and wiped your tiny bottom, saying, "Oh, baby, don't scare Mommy like that."

After placing a new diaper on you, she laid you down for a nap, and ordered your once-younger siblings, nine-year-old Amanda and six-year-old Jamie, to watch over you, until your "daddy" got home.

"Yes, Mommy," they said in unison, as you fell asleep.
11112111.title: Changed Your Diaper.

choices: Your "Daddy" Comes Home and the Family Goes on a Vacation.
11112112.content: She picked you up, and laid you down in a crib. You slowly fell asleep.
11112112.title: Nap

choices: No, he comes for some other reason.
1111212.content: Your best friend suddenly barged into the room. Does he come because he remembers your original age?
1111212.title: Your Best Friend.

choices: As his baby cousin or other
11112122.content: It immediately became clear that your best friend Jack believed that you had always been two. How does he see you?
11112122.title: No, he comes for some other reason.

choices: As his baby son or other
111121222.content: How does your best friend Jack now see you?
111121222.title: As his baby cousin or other

choices: No, he sees you as a baby relative of his girlfriend's.
1111212222.content: Has Jack somehow gotten a little older and now sees you as his son?
1111212222.title: As his baby son or other

choices: You are her baby cousin or other.
11112122222.content: For some reason, Jack now believes you are a baby relative of his girlfriend Zena's. How are you related to Zena?
11112122222.title: No, he sees you as a baby relative of his girlf...

111122.content:
Your feet no longer came off the chair and you could barely even see over the desk. You looked down, and noticed that you were dressed like a little kindergartener. You teacher held your hand and asked your best friend to "drive this little guy to the local elementary school".

"Yes, Ma'am," he said, as he got you into his car, and drove you to a kindergarten classroom.

Once there, your teacher helped you out and began to teach you and the other kindergarteners. This included your little brother Bobby. She taught everyone how to say the alphabet, and was convinced that you were Bobby's twin brother. At least you still got to go home, unfortunately you were treated like a six-year-old now.
111122.title: Back in Kindergarten

choices: fifth grade. You can't be older than eleven."
your house. Can someone tell me how a little baby got here?"
11113.content:
You noticed something was strange the minute you walked in the class. For one thing, he could hear laughing behind you, not to mention you could feel a slight breeze around your privates. It didn't help the fact that the whole place was beginning to look smaller.

         Then your English teacher said, "Oh, honey, I think you might be in the wrong place. You should be in . . ."
11113.title: English

choices: While running laps, you trip and suddenly become a little kid.
There was a chemical slipped into the swimming pool.
You don't; the transformation occurs elsewhere.
1112.content: Your first class of the day was Phys. Ed. Upon arriving in the gym, how do you grow younger?
1112.title: Head to Phys. Ed.

11121.content:
As was standard at the start of gym class, you and your classmates ran laps around the track outside. However, a few minutes you accidentally trip over rock you found laying there. You aren't too badly, but you feel a little dizzy. When that nauseous feeling fades, you see your classmates standing over you.

         You are now younger than fifteen. How old are you?
11121.title: While running laps, you trip and suddenly becom...

111211.content: Are you back to middle school age or elementary school age?
111211.title: Between the ages of 14 and 6

choices: You have turned back into a twelve-year-old.
You are in a sixth grade gym class; your classmates have regressed, too.
1112111.content: Have you merely regressed to middle school age, or are you now at a middle school gym class?
1112111.title: 12 again

choices: "What happened to you, man? You're a kid again."
"What are you doing here, kiddo? Shouldn't you still be in middle school?"
11121111.content:
Lying on the ground, you notice your classmates who have run over to you seem a little taller than before. Then you looked down at your body and saw that you had actually gotten younger. Right now, you couldn't be a day over twelve. You were dressed pretty much the same, but your clothes were now a little smaller.

         As they help you to your feet, what do your classmates ask you?
11121111.title: You have turned back into a twelve-year-old.

choices: You are now seven years old.
You are in a second grade gym class; your classmates have regressed, too.
1112112.content: Have you merely regressed back to the age of an elementary schooler, or are you now in an elementary school gym class?
1112112.title: 7 again

choices: "I don't know, man. For some reason, you're a little kid again."
"Who are you, little guy? Shouldn't you be over at the elementary school?"
11121121.content:
Lying on the ground with your classmates standing over you, you realize that they are now a lot taller than you remember - and from your perception they now look much older.

         "What - ?" you start to ask. But then you take notice of your voice. It came out high-pitched, almost like a girl's. It was the voice of a little boy.

         You glance down at your body and see the unvarnished truth: you are just a little boy. You can't be any older than seven years old. You are now wearing a SpongeBob T-shirt, blue shorts (which make your skinny hairless legs very noticeable), and a pair of shoes with a Spider-Man design on the sides. Within the shoes are a pair of blue Star Wars socks.

You are an 18 year old boy, and you just want to have a fun Friday afternoon.

As you walk, you move past the old corner stores you are used to passing everyday, but something in the alley next to you stops your vision. The sign of a new shop, a sign is above the door but it is in a language you have can't translate.

The sign says: "Magia Di Età"*

For some reason your curiosity is running high, so you decide to check out the store. You enter, and the dinging of the bell springs a woman in her 30's or so to life.

"Hello, friend! Welcome!" she says with a cheery tune to her voice.

"Hello. New in town?"

"Got anything cool?" you ask.

"I think I have just the thing that you're looking for," she says grabbing a small blue bottle from behind the counter. "This is a magical potion that can make any one person older."

"...Riiiight...." you say in disbelief. "Well, how much is it?"

"It really does work," she says. "I can prove it to you if you like."

"Oh," she said. "This costs twenty-five dollars."

"Twenty-five dollars?!" you say. "That sounds a bit outrageous to me. Yes, I would like to see it actually work! I'll only buy it if it works!"

"Okay then, here, let me test it on you," she says opening the bottle.

"Umm..." you say.

What do you do now?

1153322222221121221111122221112211112111.content:
You and Ada turned and looked at each other, marveled by your younger appearances. It was almost a shock that you had both been grown adults the day before.

         "Wow," said Ada, and you were stunned by how childish her voice now sounded. "We look like real little kids."

         "No kidding," you remarked. "I'd say we're back in second grade. This is so cool."

         "I know," Ada agreed. "Now we can just be kids again and no one will care. We won't have to think about college or any sort of responsibility for a long time."

         Even though you both had your adult memories and mentalities, you couldn't help but feel excited about this. Each of you felt a youthful energy that you couldn't help but enjoy. Rather than having to anticipate work and exams, all you to worry about playing and whether or not there would be someone around to take care of you. School wasn't even that bad. After all, second grade was a piece of cake compared to college. With your adult memories and education, you would be a couple of geniuses. You couldn't wait.

         You and Ada then proceeded to drop onto the ground with baby Sienna and just play. You ran up to the attic and brought down your old toys from the last time you were this age, and you and Ada spent the rest of the day playing with LEGOs and action figures. Meanwhile, you flipped on the TV and had Danny Phantom play in the background. Everything seemed to have gone back to when you were this age the first time.

         You truly felt like a kid again, and it felt great. You turned to grin at Ada while you played and could tell she felt the same way. You hadn't felt this relaxed and free in years. What happens now?

1153322222221121221111122221112211112112.content:
You and Ada turned and looked at each other, marveled by your younger appearances. It was almost a shock that you had both been grown adults the day before.

         "Wow," said Ada, and you were stunned by how childish her voice now sounded. "We look like real little kids."

         "No kidding," you remarked. "I'd say we're back in second grade. This is so cool."

         "I know," Ada agreed. "Now we can just be kids again and no one will care. We won't have to think about college or any sort of responsibility for a long time."

         Even though you both had your adult memories and mentalities, you couldn't help but feel excited about this. Each of you felt a youthful energy that you couldn't help but enjoy. Rather than having to anticipate work and exams, all you to worry about playing and whether or not there would be someone around to take care of you. School wasn't even that bad. After all, second grade was a piece of cake compared to college. With your adult memories and education, you would be a couple of geniuses. You couldn't wait.

         Until then, the two of you plopped your butts on the couch and decided to do something you hadn't done in about a decade - watch cartoons. You had stopped doing that around fourteen or fifteen, and it felt good to be young enough to do that again. What do you watch?

And her younger siblings, eleven-year-old Jordan and sixteen-year-old Colin, were now starting to see her as their baby sister.

         You and Ada, on the other hand, have completely forgotten Sienna was ever here. You remember that you you were once college-age, but now seem to believe you are the only ones who have regressed. You don't care, however, because this has been a dream of yours ever since you entered adulthood. Neither one of you wanted to be adults, and now you get to be little kids again. You weren't gone long. It had been weird, you thought, to be alone buying baby supplies as a middle schooler, but no one bothered you. Then you came back with bags of Huggies diapers, baby wipes, and cartons of baby powder. You even bought some smaller clothes for you and Ada; as teenagers, your adult clothes were kind of big on you.

         Before coming home, you had stopped in a nearby bathroom to change into the proper clothes. You now wore a violet-red Avengers T-shirt and a pair of dark blue jeans. It wasn't so different from your regular clothes - it was just smaller - so you felt better about it.

         When you entered the house, you found Ada rocking the wet naked Sienna. She must have just given the baby a bath.

         "All right," you said. "This should make things much easier."

         Since you had already changed into your teen clothes, you took care of the baby while Ada changed. You laid Sienna down on the kitchen table. Lifting her pudgy legs in the air, you wrapped a white Sesame Street diaper around her waist and taped it shut. Then you pulled a cute pink baby dress over her head. When that was done, she looked like the adorable baby girl she now was.

         Suffice it to say, Sienna was not happy. She immediately started crying. She was originally older than you used to be, so you imagined this was uncomfortable for her. Rocking her gently in your arms, you tried calming her down.

         "It's okay, baby," you said. "I'll find a way to fix this. I promise."

         As you are soothing Sienna, your bedroom door opened. You looked up to see Ada walking out. She now wore a purple T-shirt and a light blue skirt. She had her hair tied back in a ponytail, so she looked quite similar to how you remembered her looking the last time you two were this age.

         Ada smiled. "I take it she's not happy about her new age."

         "That's an understatement," you said.

         "Well, welcome to my world," said Ada. "She's been crying the whole time you were going." She knelt down and directed her words at the baby in your arms. "I'm sorry, but you are just a baby now. The diaper's kind of mandatory."

         Sienna stopped kicking her legs. You could tell she was still unhappy about it, but she understood.

         So... what happens now?

11533222222211212211111222211122222.content:
The minute Ada let Sienna down, she started crawling into the living room, not even seeming to care that her naked butt was clearly showing. Her mind was starting to grow more simple, more babylike. Her old life as an adult was seeming like a vivid dream, but a dream nonetheless. This life was seeming more real to her -- and more preferable. It was much easier allowing others to take care of her than having to take care of others.

         She was crawling in the living room alone for about a minute before Ada came back with old baby toys from when Andrew, Susan, and Hector were this young. She started playing, giggling happily as she did so. Oh, this was the life.

 

         About five minutes later, Andrew came home with bags of clothing. As he came up the stairs and entered the living room, he frowned questionably at the fact that Sienna was half-naked.

         "Oh, she had an accident while you were gone," Ada explained. "I figured she was probably uncomfortable in a soggy diaper. And guess what -- it looks like little Sienna likes being this age. She's been sitting here playing with Susan's old dolls not a care in the world."

         "Well, that's good," said Andrew, "because it looks like we're going to be stuck this way a while."

         Ada noticed that Andrew had already dressed in the clothes he'd bought for himself -- a maroon Avengers T-shirt, a pair of light blue shorts, and a pair of sandals. In the bag, he had with him clothes for a teen girl, as well as baby clothes, a package of Huggies disposable diapers, baby powder, and baby wipes. Handing her the bag with teen stuff, he said, "Here. Why don't I dress Sienna while you put this on?"

         Ada nodded and departed as Andrew lifted Sienna into his arms. In Susan's bedroom was where Ada chose to get dressed. She put on a yellow Lion King T-shirt and a light pink skirt over a pair of pink panties, but decided to stay barefoot; she'd always preferred to run around barefoot as a kid, and that habit she seemed to have picked up again. On a whim, she also picked up a ponytail she saw on Susan's nightstand and tied her hair into pigtails.

         She giggled as she looked into Susan's vanity. "Oh, my gods. I look so cute."

 

         When she returned to the living room, she saw that Andrew had gotten Susan into a white diaper adorned with images from the movie Frozen, as well as an adorable light blue dress, which did not quite cover it. He was kneeling on the ground, playing with Sienna as she crawled on the ground. However, when Ada came in, he got up to greet her.

         Eyeing the pigtails, he said, "You really went all out with the kid thing, huh?"

         Ada found herself giggling again. "Well, when in Rome..."

         At that moment, the door opened, and Andrew's parents, sister, and brother entered. Are they still the same age they were before Andrew, Ada, and Sienna regressed?

115332222222221.content: Your name is Thomas, your usual teen. One day you have a date with your girlfriend, but are prevented from going by your parents, who need you to watch your eight year old sister Sarah, who is having a sleepover for her birthday, while your parents are out of town. Now you are stuck home alone, with nobody except a bunch of little girls. The girls want you to get in on the fun.

1153322222222211.content:
Thomas sat in his room, annoyed at his current situation. Hours earlier he had been getting ready for a date with his girlfriend, Katie, in hopes of getting away before his little little sister's friends showed up for their weekend long birthday sleepover, which included Katie's sister Emma. Well there was no chance of getting away now. One of his Aunts seemed to be having some type of crisis, and both his parent's had to leave right away. So now he had no choice but to, look after the group of Third grade girls all weekend.

Laying in bed, strumming his guitar, while also writing lyrics down in his notebook. He could hear the girls playing in the living room, and was finding it harder to concentrate.

"Hi.", Thomas heard, breaking his concentration. Looking up he saw Katie's sister standing in his doorway.

"Uh...hi.", Thomas said a bit awkwardly, having never spent much time with her, outside of a few small interactions when he went over to Katie's house. "Something wrong...you need something?"

"No, everyone's watching a movie and I got bored.", Emma said walking over to the bed and sat down.

"Well...uh, you wan't to hang out here, until they're done?", Thomas asked, knowing he should be nice to his girlfriend's little sister.

"Sure.", Emma said, smiling at Thomas, then noticed the note book. "What are you doing?"

"Oh, just working on a new song.", Thomas said, then handed Emma the note book, for her to see. "Me and my band are going to be performing soon and I need to write some original material."

"Cool.", Emma said as she flipped through the notebook. "You wrote all these?"

"Yeah.", Thomas said, then took the note book back. "Not sure how many I'll actually use, but it's good practice."

"Can you play me something?", Emma asked excitedly, as she had never heard him play before.

"Uh....sure.", Thomas said, not seeing any problem with it, then began to tune his guitar. "So what do you want me the play?", he asked, thinking she would ask for some childish songs.

"Play me one of your's.", Emma said, as she moved around to face him directly.

"Ah...alright.", Thomas said as he thought what he should play. He didn't think she would really enjoy his band's type of music. "Alright, this song is called Emma.", he said then began to play the song, while Emma sat there entranced. Thomas didn't see it as a big deal, it was just a song that he had written for Katie, he simply replaced Katie's name with Emma, and she obviously enjoyed it.

"Wow.", Emma said, after Thomas had finished the song.

"So what do you think?", Thomas asked.

"That was amazing!", Emma squealed excitedly.

Thomas let out a small chuckle in response. "Well thanks.", Thomas said as he stood up and turned on the TV.

"What are you doing?", Emma asked.

"I need a break, figured I'd game for a bit.", Thomas said as he turned on his X Box One, and inserted a disc.

"Can I play?", Emma asked.

"Don't you want to play with Sarah and your other friends?", Thomas asked.

"They're going to be watching movies for a while. I want to play with you.", Emma said innocently.

"Alright one round. Then you go back to the party.", Thomas said, handing her the second controller.

They played, and after the first round, Emma convinced Thomas to play another, and after a few more, he decided to let her stay, considering she was one of the least annoying of his sister's friends and Katie would be grateful to him for being nice to Emma.

After a few more rounds
1153322222222211.title: This story

11533222222222111.content:
"Thomas!", Thomas and Emma heard, Sarah call out from down the hall, before she ran into the room. "Thomas we're hungry."

"Ah...alright.", Thomas said as he and Emma got off the bed. "How about I order you guys some pizza?"

"Yeah!", Sarah said.

"Alright, why don't the two of you go back to the party, while I call.", Thomas said as he dialed the number. As Emma and Sarah left, he could hear them speaking. Emma telling her, how much fun it was to spend time with him, before he could hear much else, the phone was picked up.

"Hello, this is Pizza Hut how can I help you.", a man asked.

"Ah hi, I'm going to need four large pizzas, two with just cheese and two with pepperoni.", Thomas said.

"Would you like any sides or a drink with that sir?", the man asked.

"Sure, I'll have a two liter Coke and Sprite.", Thomas said.

"Will that be all?", the man asked.

"Yeah that should be it.", Thomas said.

"Alright your order comes out to fifty-four dollars and eighty-nine cents. Can I have your address?", the man asked.

"Sure, it's 1630 Revello Drive.", Thomas said.

"Your order should arrive within an hour, will that be all?", the man asked.

"No, that's it.", Thomas said before hanging up.

After that Thomas returned to his guitar, and continued to work on the song he was writing before Emma had come in. As he finished, he heard a knock at the door. Knowing it was probably the pizza, he stood up and walked towards the door. As he walked there, he could once again hear the girls speaking. It seemed that Emma was telling the others about the time they spent together, and the girls ooOooed as she told them about the song. Opening the door, Thomas saw that the delivery man had arrived.

"Hello is this 1630 Revello Drive?", the man asked as he held out the pizza.

"Yeah that's us.", Thomas said taking the boxes and bag of soda. He then handed the man sixty dollars. "Keep the change.", he said then closed the door. Walking towards the living room he called out. "Girls the foods here!"

He then placed the boxes on a nearby table and opened two of the boxes. "Well there you go. Eat up and come get me if you need anything.", Thomas said, then ruffled Sarah's hair before returning to his room. He would get some pizza later, after the girls ate, for now he would simply watch some TV. After about an hour, he heard a knock at his door.

"What's wrong?", Thomas called out.

"Nothing it's me.", he heard Emma say.

Walking over, Thomas opened the door, where Emma stood, holding two slices of pizza in one hand and a cup of soda in the other.

"Hi...ah, what are you doing here, don't you want to be with the other girls.", Thomas asked, confused at why she was here again.

"I will, I just wanted to bring you this.", Emma said, then handed him the plate and cup.

"Well thanks.", Thomas said, putting the plate down on his desk. "You kno-". Before he could finish he turned around and Emma was already gone, and he could hear the girls giggle. Thomas then sat down to eat, "Nice kid."

After finishing the pizza, he took a few drinks of the soda and began to feel sleepy and within moments blacked out.

When he woke up he was
11533222222222111.title: Sarah Comes In

115332222222221111.content:
As Thomas began to wake up, he felt strange, he was no longer on his bed, that's for sure. Whatever he was laying on was a lot harder, and he could barely move, he was surrounded by something. "Where am I?", Thomas thought as he sat up, before sleepishly rubbed his eyes.

"What am I doing here?", Thomas quietly asked, after opening his eyes to see he was now in the living room, surrounded by his sister's sleeping friends, while Sarah slept on the couch, and to his surprise Emma slept beside him.

Still tired, Thomas stood up, but failed to notice the change of his view. "I'll have to ask them when they wake up.", Thomas said, then stepped over the sleeping girls and made his way over to the restroom.

When he got to the restroom door, he finally noticed something was off. The door knob seemed higher than usual. "What the?", Thomas thought, before having to reach up to grip the door knob.

Turning on the light, Thomas quickly made his way to Sarah's stool to look at himself in the mirror.

"Emma!", Thomas called out as he ran out to the backyard. Once he was out there, the girls were nowhere in sight. "Emma!", he called out again.

"You have to find us.", he heard Emma call out.

"Fine!", Thomas frustratingly said before stomping his foot, and going off to find the girls.

Searching around the yard, Thomas managed to find a few girls rather quickly, but still failed to find Emma.

"Emma!", Thomas called out again, hating how high his voice was. As he continued to search, the girls he had found followed close behind, giggling at his frustration. "What's so funny?", he demanded. Looking around he saw the group of girls looking up at his sister's tree house. Looking up, Thomas saw Emma and Sarah's face poking out the window. "Emma! Sarah! Get Down Here."

The girls continued to giggle, while Sarah and Emma came down the ladder. Before Thomas could say anything, Emma quickly pulled him into a hug. "You found me!", Emma happily exclaimed, before placing another kiss on Thomas's cheek, causing the girls to OOOOH. "You won, what should we play now?", she asked, excitedly.

"I don't want to play anything until you fix this.", Thomas said.

"I already told you I fixed it.", Emma said sternly.

"Then why is nothing different?", Thomas said.

"We have to wait until tomorrow.", Emma said, now come on, lets have some fun.

The room he was in, wasn't his and it wasn't Sarah's. Sarah and the other girls were there, but the room seemed to be split between two siblings, a boy and a girl.

'She didn't fix this!?', Thomas thought as he quickly got off the bed and headed towards the door. 'Need to call Katie, she can get Emma to change me back.'

115332222222221111112.content:
"What do you want squirt? Can't handle your girlfriend?", Katie said tiredly.

Thomas stood there shocked, his girlfriend was in his home, and was acting like everything was normal, like he was suppose to be a little kid, and he was dating her sister. "B-b-b", Thomas stuttered, not sure what to say.

"Just go back to bed, its still pretty early.", Katie said, turning away from him and going back to sleep.

Looking around the room, Thomas saw how different things looked now, his football trophies were now replaced with Little League trophies and the pictures no longer had an older and younger sibling, but now twins siblings. He then ran to his former room, only to find that it was now replaced with a home office, probably his father's. "What the hell?", Thomas asked in wonder.

Thomas then returned to Sarah and now his room, and shook Emma awake. After a few seconds Emma opened her eyes and once again pulled Thomas in for a hug. "Thomas I fixed it isnt this great?", Emma asked.

Thomas gently pushed her away. "How is this fixed?", Thomas whispered, not wanting to wake up the others.

"Now we have a grown up to look after us. Now we wont get in trouble.", Emma said.

"Bu-", Thomas stopped himself from yelling, "We need to talk outside.", Thomas said.

The pair then exited the room, and sneaked out the back door, without waking Katie. They then made their way to the tree house, where hopefully nobody would see them.

The pair sat across from each other, Thomas clenched his fist, not wanting to yell at Emma, knowing she was just a little kid with a crush. "Emma we have to change me back.", Thomas said as calmly as possible.

"But why, I thought you liked me.", Emma said with a slight whimper.

"I do but n-", Thomas chose his words carefully, not wanting to hurt her feelings. "I do, but im not a kid, I'll never be happy like this.", Thomas said then took Emma's hand gently, "Now please fix this."

Emma looked down, sadly. "I want to be your girlfriend."

"I know, but it just cant work like this.", Thomas said. "Now how do we fix this."

Emma then gave him a small smile. "Like the princess and the frog, with a kiss.", Emma said.

"But who am I...", Thomas stopped, realizing where Emma was going with this. "Emma im not sure..."

"All it takes is one.", Emma said, taking his other hands. "then everything will be right."

"Just one.", Thomas said nervously, really glad nobody was around.

"Just one!", Emma said.

Thomas let out a huff of frustration. "Alright, just one.", Thomas and Emma then closed their eyes and leaned forward. As their lips met, Thomas felt a change.

121.content:
Anne was walking home from school one day. Being in grade 9 was not the easiest thing in the world. What with homework, mean teachers and her own problems, she just wished that it would all stop and she could be young again. As she was walking, she thought more and more about how great it would be if she could be younger. Just then, out of the corner of her eye, she saw a glint in the grass beside her. Puzzled, she picked it up. It was a round disk, with a red circle in the center. It said on it: "Age Changer. If you want to take a break from your regular life, just set the dial and press the red button. You will regress or progress to that age and have your vacation. To get back to your normal age you must reset the dial and press the other green button. You will find yourself on the exact spot you left and in the exact same state you left."

Anne stared at the thing. This was it! She found the dial and paused. Did she want to get older and see what it was like to be an adult, or get younger and relive the simple joys of childhood?
121.title: Anne Finds The Device

123.content:
Doctor Grace Moore has been working at Mega Corp Labs for the last 12 years . The lab worked on many areas of study . The day started off as most days . Doctor Moore read over the current projects . The one that popped today was Project TK-72 . The lead researcher claims that mice life span have been triple by using a rare plant in combination with device that fires a streams of high energy chonotrons . A Chonotron is a particle that interacts with passage of time . The rare plant was found in the city of Kabul, Afghanistan . The plant's leaves was distilled into a gray fluid . The gray fluid was given to the lab mice . The blood test on the mice has shown the aging process was slowed down . The lead researcher Dr Harris is asking for more funding . Grace ponder over the report for half hour before deciding on going to lab conducting Project TK-72 .

Grace called up Dr Harris to talk about data in the reports . Doctor Renee Harris have just been promoted to lead researcher on this project . Renee was only 28 years old with a very brilliant mind. The two women arranged for a time for Grace to stop by the lab .

The morning at nine am , Grace entered Renee's lab . Renee was over seeing repairs to the Chonotron emitter by the support staff . The two women greeted each other and begin going over the process used on the lab mice . The workers finish the repairs to the emitter . The next two hours passed with Renee making a very good case for more funding . Grace began asking questions about the plant distilling process . The two women were standing by a vat of the gray fluid when a loud bang come from the emitter . A piece of metal flown from the emitter almost hitting Grace but poke a hole in the vat . The gray fluid sprayed over both women . The emitter was by a power spike . Grace and Renee stood motionless for a few seconds . The gray fluid soak thought their clothes .Grace and Renee both know the emitter had to shut down . The emitter bathed the lab in dim green light . Five minutes pasted before the emitter was powered down .

Grace declared that emitter was locked down and it was time to get into the decontamination showers . The cold water washed over the women as they stripped out of the exposed clothes . The medical staff was outside the glass door watching . The hazmat crew wearing white suit cleaned up the lab and sealed it . Grace and Renee waited for the medical all clear inside a clean room .
